name: lighter
description: A lighter must be carried to use various drugs, like cigarettes, or to light things like molotov cocktails.  You can also use a lighter to light nearby items on fire.

name: matchbook
description: Matches must be carried to use various drugs, like cigarettes, or to light things like molotov cocktails.  You can also use matches to light nearby items on fire.

name: fire drill
description: A fire drill is a simple item for firestarting, made from two pieces of wood and some string. Although it is constructed out of simple materials, it's slow and rather difficult to get a fire started with this tool.

name: sewing kit
description: Use a sewing kit on an article of clothing to attempt to repair or reinforce that clothing. This uses your tailoring skill.

name: scissors
description: Use scissors to cut items made from cotton (mostly clothing) into rags.

name: hammer
description: Use a hammer, with nails and two by fours in your inventory, to board up adjacent doors and windows.

name: fire extinguisher
description: Use a fire extinguisher to put out adjacent fires.

name: extra battery mod
description: With enough electronics skill, you could attach this to your devices to increase their battery capacity.

name: gasoline lantern (off)
description: A small gasoline powered lantern. It does not provide much light, but it lasts a long time. Use it to turn it on.

name: gasoline lantern (on)
description: A small gasoline powered lantern. It does not provide much light, but it lasts a long time. It is turned on. Use it to turn it off.

name: flashlight (off)
description: Using this flashlight will turn it on, assuming it is charged with batteries. A turned-on flashlight will provide light during the night or while underground.

name: flashlight (on)
description: This flashlight is turned on, and continually draining its batteries. It provides light during the night or while underground. Use it to turn it off.

name: lightstrip (dead)
description: A burnt-out lightstrip. You could disassemble this to recover the amplifier circuit.

name: lightstrip (inactive)
description: A light-emitting circuit wired directly to some batteries. Once activated, provides 25 hours of light per 3 (battery) charges. When the batteries die, you'll need to scrap it to recover the components that are reusable.

name: lightstrip (active)
description: A light-emitting circuit wired directly to some batteries. Provides a weak light, lasting 25 hours per 3 (battery) charges. When the batteries die, you'll need to scrap it to recover the components that are reusable.

name: glowstick
description: A small blue light glowstick, bend it to break the glass cylinder inside and start the reaction to produce a very small amount of light.

name: active glowstick
description: This glowstick is active and producing light. It will last for a few hours before burning out.

name: dead glowstick
description: A spent glowstick, essentially trash.

name: hotplate
description: A small heating element. Indispensable for cooking and chemistry. Try not to burn yourself.

name: soldering iron
description: A piece of metal that can get very hot. Necessary for electronics crafting. You could also use it to cauterize wounds, if you had to.

name: water purifier
description: Using this item on a container full of water will purify the water. Water taken from uncertain sources like a river may be dirty.

name: two-way radio
description: Using this allows you to send out a signal; either a general SOS, or if you are in contact with a faction, to send a direct call to them.

name: radio (off)
description: Using this radio turns it on. It will pick up any nearby signals being broadcast and play them audibly.

name: radio (on)
description: This radio is turned on, and continually draining its batteries. It is playing the broadcast being sent from any nearby radio towers.

name: directional antenna
description: An antenna designed to pick up signals better when pointed at the source.

name: military black box
description: If you can find a system to analyze this you may find something of interest.

name: noise emitter (off)
description: This device was constructed by 'enhancing' a radio with some amplifier circuits. It's completely lost its ability to pick up a station, but it's nice and loud now. Could be useful to distract zombies.

name: noise emitter (on)
description: This device has been turned on and is emitting horrible sounds of radio static. Quick, get away from it before it draws zombies to you!

name: road map
description: A road map. Use it to read points of interest, including, but not limited to, location(s) of hospital(s) nearby.

name: crowbar
description: A prying tool. Use it to open locked doors without destroying them, or to lift manhole covers.

name: hoe
description: A farming implement. Use it to turn tillable land into a slow-to-cross pile of dirt.

name: shovel
description: A digging tool. Use it to dig pits adjacent to your location.

name: rubber hose
description: A flexible rubber hose. Can be used for crafting, or siphoning fuel from a vehicle.

name: chainsaw (off)
description: Using this item will, if loaded with gas, cause it to turn on, making a very powerful, but slow, unwieldy, and noisy, melee weapon.

name: chainsaw (on)
description: This chainsaw is on, and is continuously draining gasoline. Use it to turn it off.

name: jackhammer
description: This jackhammer runs on gasoline. Use it (if loaded) to blast a hole in adjacent solid terrain.

name: jacqueshammer
description: Ce jacqueshammer marche a l'essence. Utilisez-le (si charge) pour creuser un trou dans un terrain solide adjacent.

name: bubblewrap
description: A sheet of plastic covered with air-filled bubbles. Use it to set it on the ground, creating a trap that will warn you with noise when something steps on it.

name: bear trap
description: A spring-loaded pair of steel jaws. Use it to set it on the ground, creating a trap that will ensnare and damage anything that steps on it. If you are carrying a shovel, you will have the option of burying it.

name: nailboard trap
description: Several pieces of wood, nailed together, with nails sticking straight up. If an unsuspecting victim steps on it, they'll get nails through the foot.

name: tripwire trap
description: A tripwire trap must be placed across a doorway or other thin passage. Its purpose is to trip up bypassers, causing them to stumble and possibly hurt themselves minorly.

name: crossbow trap
description: A simple tripwire is attached to the trigger of a loaded crossbow. When pulled, the crossbow fires. Only a single round can be used, after which the trap is disabled.

name: shotgun trap
description: A simple tripwire is attached to the trigger of a loaded sawn-off shotgun. When pulled, the shotgun fires. Two rounds are used; the first time the trigger is pulled, one or two may be used.

name: blade trap
description: A machete is attached laterally to a motor, with a tripwire controlling its throttle. When the tripwire is pulled, the blade is swung around with great force. The trap forms a 3x3 area of effect.

name: light snare kit
description: A kit for a simple trap consisting of a string noose and a snare trigger. Requires a young tree nearby. Effective at trapping and killing some small animals.

name: heavy snare kit
description: A kit for a simple trap consisting of a rope noose and a snare trigger. Requires a tree nearby. Effective at trapping monsters.

name: land mine
description: An anti-personnel mine that is triggered when stepped upon.

name: geiger ctr (off)
description: A tool for measuring radiation. Using it will prompt you to choose whether to scan yourself or the terrain, or to turn it on, which will provide continuous feedback on ambient radiation.

name: geiger ctr (on)
description: A tool for measuring radiation. It is in continuous scan mode, and will produce quiet clicking sounds in the presence of ambient radiation. Using it allows you to turn it off, or scan yourself or the ground.

name: teleporter
description: An arcane device, powered by plutonium fuel cells. Using it will cause you to teleport a short distance away.

name: goo canister
description: "Warning: contains highly toxic and corrosive materials. Contents may be sentient. Open at your own risk."

name: pipe bomb
description: A section of a pipe filled with explosive materials. Use this item to light the fuse, which gives you 3 turns before it detonates. You will need a lighter. It is somewhat unreliable, and may fail to detonate.

name: active pipe bomb
description: This pipe bomb's fuse is lit, and it will explode any second now. Throw it immediately!

name: grenade
description: Use this item to pull the pin, turning it into an active grenade. You will then have five turns before it explodes; throwing it would be a good idea.

name: active grenade
description: This grenade is active, and will explode any second now. Better throw it!

name: flashbang
description: Use this item to pull the pin, turning it into an active flashbang. You will then have five turns before it detonates with intense light and sound, blinding, deafening and disorienting anyone nearby.

name: active flashbang
description: This flashbang is active, and will soon detonate with intense light and sound, blinding, deafening and disorienting anyone nearby.

name: EMP grenade
description: Use this item to pull the pin, turning it into an active EMP grenade. You will then have three turns before it detonates, creating an EMP field that damages robots and drains bionic energy.

name: active EMP grenade
description: This EMP grenade is active, and will shortly detonate, creating a large EMP field that damages robots and drains bionic energy.

name: scrambler grenade
description: This is a highly modified EMP grenade, designed to scramble robots' control chips, rather than destroy them. This converts the robot to your side for a  short time, before the backup systems kick in.

name: active scrambler grenade
description: This scrambler grenade is active, and will soon detonate, releasing a control wave that temporarily converts robots to your side.

name: teargas canister
description: Use this item to pull the pin. Five turns after you do that, it will begin to expell a highly toxic gas for several turns. This gas damages and slows those who enter it, as well as obscuring vision and scent.

name: active teargas
description: This canister of teargas has had its pin removed, indicating that it is (or will shortly be) expelling highly toxic gas.

name: smoke bomb
description: Use this item to pull the pin. Five turns after you do that, it will begin to expell a thick black smoke. This smoke will slow those who enter it, as well as obscuring vision and scent.

name: active smoke bomb
description: This smoke bomb has had its pin removed, indicating that it is (or will shortly be) expelling thick smoke.

name: molotov cocktail
description: A bottle of flammable liquid with a rag inserted. Use this item to light the rag; you will, of course, need a lighter in your inventory to do this. After lighting it, throw it to cause fires.

name: molotov cocktail (lit)
description: A bottle of flammable liquid with a flaming rag inserted. Throwing it will cause the bottle to break, spreading fire. The flame may go out shortly if you do not throw it. Dropping it while lit is not safe.

name: acid bomb
description: A glass vial, split into two chambers. The divider is removable, which will cause the chemicals to mix. If this mixture is exposed to air (as happens if you throw the vial) they will spill out as a pool of potent acid.

name: acid bomb (active)
description: A glass vial, with two chemicals mixing inside. If this mixture is exposed to air (as happens if you throw the vial), they will spill out as a pool of potent acid.

name: dynamite
description: Several sticks of explosives with a fuse attached. Use this item to light the fuse; you will, of course, need a lighter in your inventory to do this. Shortly after lighting the fuse, this item will explode, so get away!

name: dynamite (lit)
description: The fuse on this dynamite is lit and hissing.  It'll explode any moment now.

name: pack of firecrackers
description: A pack of 25 firecrackers with a starter fuse. Use this item to light the fuse; you will need a lighter of course. Shortly after you light the fuse they will begin to explode, so throw them quickly!

name: pack of firecrackers (lit)
description: A pack of 25 firecrackers that has been lit, the fuse is hissing. Throw them quickly before the start to explode.

name: firecracker
description: A firecracker with a short fuse. Use this item to light the fuse; you will need a lighter of course. Shortly after you light the fuse it will explode, so throw it quickly!

name: firecracker (lit)
description: A firecracker that has been lit, the fuse is hissing. Throw it quickly before it explodes.

name: mininuke
description: An extremely powerful weapon--essentially a hand-held nuclear bomb. Use it to activate the timer. Ten turns later it will explode, leaving behind a radioactive crater. The explosion is large enough to take out a house.

name: mininuke (active)
description: This miniature nuclear bomb has a light blinking on the side, showing that it will soon explode. You should probably get far away from it.

name: zombie pheromone
description: This is some kind of disgusting ball of rotting meat. Squeezing it causes a small cloud of pheromones to spray into the air, causing nearby zombies to become friendly for a short period of time.

name: portal generator
description: A rare and arcane device, covered in alien markings.

name: inactive manhack
description: An inactive manhack. Manhacks are fist-sized robots that fly through the air. They are covered with whirring blades and attack by throwing themselves against their target. Use this item to activate the manhack.

name: inactive turret
description: An inactive turret. Using this item involves turning it on and placing it on the ground, where it will attach itself. The turret will then identify you as a friendly, and attack all enemies with an SMG.

name: UPS (off)
description: A unified power supply, or UPS, is a device developed jointly by military and scientific interests for use in combat and the field. The UPS is designed to power armor and some guns, but drains batteries quickly.

name: UPS (on)
description: A unified power supply, or UPS, is a device developed jointly by military and scientific interests for use in combat and the field. The UPS is designed to power armor and some guns, but drains batteries quickly.

name: tazer
description: A high-powered stun gun. Use this item to attempt to electrocute an adjacent enemy, damaging and temporarily paralyzing them. Because the shock can actually jump through the air, it is difficult to miss.

name: mp3 player (off)
description: This battery-devouring device is loaded up with someone's music collection. Fortunately, there's lots of songs you like, and listening to it will raise your morale slightly. Use it to turn it on.

name: mp3 player (on)
description: This mp3 player is turned on and playing some great tunes, raising your morale steadily while on your person. It runs through batteries quickly; you can turn it off by using it. It also obscures your hearing.

name: vortex stone
description: A stone with spirals all over it, and holes around its perimeter. Though it is fairly large, it weighs next to nothing. Air seems to gather around it.

name: dog food
description: Food for dogs. It smells strange, but dogs love it.

name: booby trap
description: A crude explosive device triggered by a piece of string.

name: C4-Explosive
description: Highly explosive, use with caution! Armed with a small timer.

name: C4-Explosive(armed)
description: Highly explosive, use with caution. Comes with a small timer. It's armed and ticking!

name: dog whistle
description: A small whistle. When used, it produces a high tone that causes nearby friendly dogs to either follow you closely and stop attacking, or start attacking enemies if they are currently docile.

name: vacutainer
description: A tool for drawing blood, including a vacuum-sealed test tube for holding the sample. Use this tool to draw blood, either from yourself or from a corpse you are standing on.

name: welder
description: A tool for welding metal pieces together. Useful for construction.

name: cot
description: A military style fold up cot, not quite as comfortable as a bed but much better than slumming it on the ground.

name: rollmat
description: A sheet of foam which can be rolled tightly for storage. Insulates you from the floor, making it easier to sleep

name: X-Acto knife
description: A small, very sharp knife.  Causes decent damage but is difficult to hit with. Its small tip allows for a precision strike in the hands of the skilled.

name: scalpel
description: A small, very sharp knife, used in surgery. Its small tip allows for a precision strike in the hands of the skilled.

name: machete
description: This huge iron knife makes an excellent melee weapon.

name: katana
description: A rare sword from Japan. Deadly against unarmored targets, and still very effective against armor.

name: knife spear
description: A simple wood pole made deadlier by the blade tied to it.

name: rapier
description: Preferred weapon of gentlemen and swashbucklers. Light and quick, it makes any battle a stylish battle.

name: awl pike
description: A medieval weapon consisting of a wood shaft, tipped with an iron spike. Though large and heavy compared to other spears, its accuracy and damage are unparalled.

name: broadsword
description: An early modern sword seeing use in the 16th, 17th and 18th centuries. Called 'broad' to contrast with the slimmer rapiers.

name: makeshift machete
description: A large blade that has had a portion of the handle wrapped in duct tape, making it easier to wield as a rough machete.

name: makeshift halberd
description: A large blade attached to a long stick. Could do a considerable amount of damage.

name: steak knife
description: A sharp knife. Makes a poor melee weapon, but is decent at butchering corpses.

name: butcher knife
description: A sharp, heavy knife. Makes a good melee weapon, and is the best item for butchering corpses.

name: combat knife
description: Designed for combat, and deadly in the right hands. Can be used to butcher corpses.

name: wood saw
description: A flimsy saw, useful for cutting through wood objects.

name: wood axe
description: A large two-handed axe. Makes a good melee weapon, but is a bit slow.

name: hacksaw
description: A sturdy saw, useful for cutting through metal objects.

name: tent
description: A small tent, just big enough to fit a person comfortably.

name: torch
description: A large stick, wrapped in gasoline soaked rags. When lit, produces a fair amount of light

name: torch (lit)
description: A large stick, wrapped in gasoline soaked rags. This is burning, producing plenty of light

name: candle
description: A thick candle, doesn't provide very much light, but it can burn for quite a long time.

name: candle (lit)
description: A thick candle, doesn't provide very much light, but it can burn for quite a long time. This candle is lit.

name: brazier
description: A large stand with slots in the side. (a)ctivate it and place it somewhere then set fires in it with no risk of spreading.

name: funnel
description: A funnel used to collect rainwater. (a)ctivate it and place it outside then collect water from it when it rains.

name: kinetic bullet puller
description: A tool used for disassembling firearm ammunition.

name: hand press & die set
description: A small hand press for hand loading firearm ammunition. Comes with everything  you need to start hand loading.

name: screwdriver
description: A Philips-head screwdriver, important for almost all electronics crafting and most mechanics crafting.

name: wrench
description: An adjustable wrench. Makes a decent melee weapon, and is used in many mechanics crafting recipes.

name: snare trigger
description: A stick that has been cut into a trigger mechanism for a snare trap.

name: bolt cutters
description: A large pair of bolt cutters, you could use them to cut padlocks or heavy gauge wire.

name: mop
description: An unwieldy mop. Good for cleaning up spills.

name: picklock kit
description: A set of sturdy steel picklocks, essential for silently opening locks.

name: pickaxe
description: A large steel pickaxe, strike the earth!

name: spray can
description: A spray can, filled with paint. Use this tool to make graffiti on the floor.

name: rag
description: Rag, useful in crafting and possibly stopping bleeding

name: PDA
description: A small multipurpose electronic device. Can be loaded with a variety of apps, providing all kinds of functionality.

name: PDA - Flashlight
description: A small multipurpose electronic device. This PDA has its flashlight app on, and is providing light.

name: pocket knife
description: A small pocket knife, not great for combat, but better than nothing.

name: bone needle
description: A sharp needle made from a bone. It would be useful for making rough clothing and items

name: stone hammer
description: A rock affixed to a stick, functions adequately as a hammer, but really can't compare to a proper hammer.

name: stone axe
description: A sharpened stone affixed to a stick, works passably well as an axe but really can't compare to a proper axe..

name: stone shovel
description: A flattened stone affixed to a stick, works passably well as a shovel but really can't compare to a real shovel.

name: digging stick
description: A large stick, with the end carved into a blade for digging. Can be used to dig shallow pits, but not deep ones.

name: shelter kit
description: A small shelter, made of sticks and skins. (a)ctivate it to place.

name: damaged shelter kit
description: A small shelter, made of sticks and skins. (a)ctivate it to place. This shelter has been damaged, and needs repairs.

name: heatpack
description: A heatpack, used to treat sports injuries and heat food.  Usable only once.

name: used heatpack
description: A heatpack, used to treat sports injuries and heat food.  This one has been used already and is now useless.

name: Packed M72 LAW
description: An M72 LAW, packed in its storage form. (a)ctivate it to pop it out and make it ready to fire. Once activated, it cannot be repacked.

name: sealed jar of canned meat
description: A sealed glass jar containing some meat.  Activate to open and enjoy.

name: sealed jar of canned cad
description: A sealed glass jar containing human meat.  Activate to open and enjoy.

name: sealed jar of canned veggy
description: A sealed glass jar containing veggy.  Activate to open and enjoy.

name: sealed jar of canned apple
description: A sealed glass jar containing a sliced apple.  Activate to open and enjoy.

name: cordless drill
description: A cordless drill with a selection of drill bits. The charger base contains a battery draining attachment so the drill can be charged in lieu of mains power.

name: vacuum sealer
description: A portable heat sealer unit with an air pump, for vacuum packing of food.

name: vacuum-packed meat slices
description: Vacuum packed meat slices in plastic packaging.  Activate to open and enjoy.

name: vacuum-packed veggy chunks
description: Vacuum packed veggy chunks in plastic packaging.  Activate to open and enjoy.

name: vacuum-packed apple slices
description: Vacuum packed apple slices in plastic packaging..  Activate to open and enjoy.

name: medical gauze
description: A decent sized piece of cotton designed for medical purposes.
